about_the_game:
"

Big Bad Wolf: Adventures, Options, and Other Stuff for Big Apple Sewer Samurai Season 1, Episode 1

Note: You need the Savage Worlds core book and Big Apple Sewer Samurai Setting Book to play.
Dark caverns, dimensional prisons, underground robot factory and... Central Park? Delve into this first adventure for the Big Apple Sewer Samurai setting like it's Saturday morning in the 80s again!
You'll find a lot to improve your Savage World experience within this module adapted from the 50+ page product:
  • Rules for Magic item design, arcane locations and portals to other dimensions. (Usable in many other Savage Worlds settings even if you don't own BASS)
  • A new character option for BASS (requires the Super Powers Companion book).
  • 15 new Edges to further develop your characters.
  • 16 characters and 4 locations to give life to your cartoon-inspired setting.
  • A complete adventure and several Savage Tales that can be used in the BASS universe or easily translated into your own setting with ease.
  • 4 New Maps with Line of Sight included
"
